_comments.exec_name: Name of the script to run (without extension). The script is expected in src/
_comments.log_dir: Directory for executor stdout/stderr logs (default: outputs/logs)

_comments.partition: SLURM partition (--partition), leave empty for default
_comments.account: Account/project for billing (--account), leave empty if not required
_comments.email: Email for notifications (--mail-user), leave empty to disable
_comments.email_type: When to email: NONE, BEGIN, END, FAIL, ALL (--mail-type)
_comments.log_dir: Directory for SLURM stdout/stderr logs (default: outputs/slurm_logs)
_comments.exclude: Nodes to exclude (--exclude), leave empty for none
_comments.constraint: Node constraints (--constraint), leave empty for none
_comments.gres: Generic resources like GPUs (--gres), e.g. 'gpu:1', leave empty for none
_comments.julia_path: Path to Julia bin directory (e.g., '~/.juliaup/bin'). Needed for SLURM since compute nodes don't source .bashrc
